long_description: No matter the expedition, the 20L SealLine Nimbus(TM) dry bag provides a haven for your gear. Tough 210-denier nylon coated with urethane stands up to rough treatment; radio-frequency welded seams offer many seasons of use. Dry Seal(TM) roll-down closure keeps the moisture out via continuous, double-sealing strips; quick-release side buckle offers easy access to contents. The SealLine Nimbus dry sack is PVC-free. Not intended for prolonged submersion.
short_description: No matter the expedition, the 20L SealLine Nimbus(TM) dry bag provides a haven for your gear.
